entry.title: An undocumented aspect of the uops cache miss granularity on Skylake microarchitecture.

link.title: An undocumented aspect of the uops cache miss granularity on Skylake microarchitecture.

entry.summary: Introduction Starting Sandy Brindge microarchitecture the uops cache (a.k.a. Decoded ICache, DSB, Decode Stream Buffer) is a part of the CPU Front-end and is responsible for caching microoperation...
